attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Barking council want to build more homes in Barking. The main roads in and around the area are gridlocked an hour either side of rush hour, you can't get on a train or bus in rush hour, Greatfields Park floods sewage when we have extremly heavy rain as the drains cannot cope with what we have now, There’s barely enough water pressure and volume. The area is already over populated and the council would do what they have with recently built homes give them to people from outside the area not helping the local families.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
